Magic Notes:
Eldritch Invocations: Select 5
Armor Of Shadows: Cast Mage Armor on self at will
Bewitching Whispers: Use Warlock spell slot to cast Compulsion 1/long rest
Eldritch Spear: R300' Eldritch Blast
Mask Of Many Faces: Cast Disguise Self at will
Misty Visions: Cast Silent Image at will
Pact Of The Chain: Know Find Familiar, forego one attack for familiar attack
Whispers Of The Grave: Cast Speak With Dead at will
